pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.10: [Sp.2.634](): _Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhanti idaṃ pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṃ pañjaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva honti salākabaddhāni ca._ “_Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhan_: this is said for the purpose of showing the frame of the three sunshades. For they are bound at the rim and bound at the ribs.”
